TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 319
TEI.2.document_title: Elias Bates to Stephen F. Austin, 08-08-1817

barker_notes.barker_summary: Lead deliveries, August 8, 14, 26, 28, September 5, 20, 1817. Elias Bates's receipts to Stephen F. Austin.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 319

div1.p: Lead deliveries, August 8, 14, 26, 28, September 5, 20, 1817. Elias Bates's receipts to Stephen F. Austin.
Mr J Staples delivd 81 Bars of lead weighing 3352 lb
Mr John Staples Delivd 71 Bars of Lead weighing Twenty Nine Hundred and twelve pounds.
Mr John Staples delivd—40 1/2 Bars of lead weighing—sixteen Hundred and Sixteen pounds
Mr John Staples Deliverd 67 Bars of lead weighing 2763lb
Received of John Staples or Bareer 67 Bars of Lead weighing twenty seven hundred and sixty six pounds for Stephen F. Austin
Mr John Staples Delivd 50 Bars of Lead weighing Two Thousand and Thirteen pounds
